# MC2  [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/c-cube/mc2.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/c-cube/mc2)

MCÂ² ("Model Constructing Modular Contraption") is a modular SMT solver
in OCaml, based on the MCSat calculus.
